name: Lone Journey Home
description:
A venture through a broken mind awaits... The goal?

Make it back to reality!

Avoid the clutches of everything that tries to drag you away.

Lets hope you will make it out.

This psychological Platformer deals with the Main-Characters struggle with depression. We tried approaching this topic as good as we could and the one week time frame would allow it. Some Players might not agree with our representation and that´s okay.

Warning:

Contains slight jumpscares

Made for the Brackeys 2022.1 GameJam
